Package dev.galactic.star.database.impl.objects

Class Column

java.lang.Object
dev.galactic.star.database.impl.objects.Column
public class Column extends Object
Class holding the Column's metadata.
Author:
PrismoidNW

  • Constructor Details

    • Column

      public Column(String name, ColumnType fieldType, boolean canBeNull, boolean autoIncrement, int maxSize)
      Default constructor used to set the different metadata of a column (Name, field type, autoincrement, etc).
      Parameters:
      name - Database Name.
      fieldType - Type of column.
      canBeNull - Whether the Column can have null values.
      autoIncrement - Whether to auto increment the value.
      maxSize - Max size of the value.

  • Method Details

    • getFieldType

      public ColumnType getFieldType()
      Gets the type of Column specified in ColumnType enum.
      Returns:
      ColumnType.

    • canBeNull

      public boolean canBeNull()
      Gets whether the column can have a null value.
      Returns:
      true/false stating whether the column can be null.

    • getMaxSize

      public int getMaxSize()
      Gets the max size of the column value contents. From 0 - maxSize stated.
      Returns:
      int of the max size the value can be.

    • autoIncrements

      public boolean autoIncrements()
      Gets whether the value can auto increment. NOTE: MUST BE A INTEGER TYPE.
      Returns:
      true/false.

    • setAutoIncrement

      public Column setAutoIncrement(boolean autoIncrement)
      Sets whether the value can auto increment. NOTE: MUST BE A INTEGER TYPE.
      Parameters:
      autoIncrement - true/false.
      Returns:
      Column for method chaining.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the column name.
      Returns:
      String of the column name.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a human-readable String for debugging purposes. It prints the column information.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String of the column data.
